survey_name: Online Education Platform User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of online education platforms to understand their experiences, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which online education platform do you use most frequently?
questions.client_notes: Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which online education platform do you use most frequently?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the course content available on your primary platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
